name: admin.conversations.convertToPrivate
desc: Convert a public channel to a private channel.

channel_id.desc: The channel to convert to private.

name.desc: Name of private channel to create. Only respected when converting an MPIM.

errors.channel_not_found: The value passed for `channel` was invalid.
errors.channel_type_not_supported: The value passed for `channel` was a DM, MPDM, private, or the 'general' channel.
errors.could_not_convert_channel: This channel could not be converted to private.
errors.default_org_wide_channel: The default org-wide channel cannot be converted to private.
errors.external_channel_migrating: This external channel is migrating, so it can't be converted to private.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The provided token doesn't have access to this method.
errors.method_not_supported_for_channel_type: This type of conversation cannot be used with this method.
errors.name_taken: A private channel cannot be created with the given name.
errors.restricted_action: A workspace preference prevents the authenticated user from creating private channels.
